channel.title: Help npc options!

item.title: Help npc options!
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

ok i took this code

			talk("Do you want to start the Desert Treasure Quest?", 251);
			break;
		case 38:
			choice("Yes.", "No.");
			break;

put it at the bottom of those

and changed it to this

		case 124:
			talk("Do you want to buy a Lotto ticket for 10k?", 0);
			break;
		case 125:
			choice("Yes, Here is 10k.", "No thanks.");
			break;

how do i change what the options do? i wanna make it either exit or give and delete an itemâ€¦
